alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Johnson County through 245 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Buffalo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Johnson County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 285 and 298. Interstate 90 between mile markers 59 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
